hero.title: TEXOR
hero.subtitle: Precise Winding, Unparalleled Quality
hero.description: Behsa Faraz Kavir Engineering Company under TEXOR brand, designer and manufacturer of spinning and machine carpet industry machinery

about.title: About Texor
about.subtitle: Behsa Faraz Kavir Engineering Company
about.description: Behsa Faraz Kavir Engineering Company under TEXOR brand has started its activity with the aim of designing and manufacturing parts and machinery for the spinning and machine carpet industry.
about.companyText: Behsa Faraz Kavir Engineering Company under TEXOR brand has started its activity with the aim of designing and manufacturing parts and machinery for the spinning and machine carpet industry. We are committed to producing world-class quality machines with high engineering precision.
about.missionText: To produce world-class quality machines with high engineering precision and competitiveness in domestic and international markets

featuresDescriptions.precision: Design and manufacturing with the highest engineering precision using world-class technologies
featuresDescriptions.quality: Production of world-class quality products meeting international standards
featuresDescriptions.export: Focus on producing products suitable for export and competition in global markets
featuresDescriptions.innovation: Using the latest technologies and innovative methods in design and manufacturing

products.title: Texor Products
products.subtitle: Specialized Machinery for Spinning and Machine Carpet Industry

windingMachine.title: Traversing Thread Winder
windingMachine.description: Thread winding machine with advanced traversing system and precise control
windingMachine.features: Individual speed adjustment, thread break sensor, weight and length display

bobbinWinder.title: Traversing Bobbin Winder
bobbinWinder.description: Industrial bobbin winder with traversing technology for complete thread uniformity
bobbinWinder.features: Separate drives, operator efficiency control, shift work recording

lacquerMachine.title: Traversing Lacquer Machine
lacquerMachine.description: Lacquering system with traversing motion for uniform coating
lacquerMachine.features: Thickness control, uniform motion, high efficiency

specifications.title: Technical Specifications
specifications.capacityDesc: Number of designable heads: minimum 5, maximum unlimited (according to customer order)
controlFeatures: Thread weight display for each head
Individual speed and length setting for each head or group of heads
Real-time production length display and shift production recording
Definition of 4 work shifts (A, B, C, D) with operator efficiency calculation
specifications.safetyDesc: Thread break sensor and automatic stop for machine safety
specifications.independenceDesc: Failure of one head does not stop the entire machine
specifications.efficiency: Separate Drives and Optimal Energy Consumption
specifications.efficiencyDesc: Separate drive for each motor for better adjustment and reduced energy consumption
specifications.qualityDesc: Complete uniformity in wound thread output
specifications.productivityDesc: Using advanced traversing system to increase production speed
specifications.traverseDesc: Solving problems of old machines with drum grooves and reducing thread breakage
specifications.materialsDesc: Using special ceramics in thread path, anti-friction rollers, steel and aluminum alloy
specifications.compatibilityDesc: Support for different thread numbers (single-ply, multi-ply, thick, thin)

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by leading textile manufacturers across Iran and beyond
testimonials.content1: TEXOR's bobbin winding machines have revolutionized our production efficiency. The precision and reliability are outstanding, and their after-sales support is exceptional.
testimonials.content2: We've been using TEXOR's traversing lacquer machines for over 3 years. The uniform coating quality and reduced maintenance costs have significantly improved our operations.
testimonials.content3: The traversing bobbin winder from TEXOR has eliminated thread breakage issues we faced with older machines. Highly recommended for any textile manufacturer.

buyerJourney.title: Choose Your Journey
buyerJourney.subtitle: Whether you're a new customer, engineer, procurement manager, or potential partner, we have the right path to help you succeed with TEXOR solutions.

descriptions.newCustomer: First-time textile machinery buyer looking for reliable solutions
descriptions.designEngineer: Technical professional seeking detailed specifications and customization
descriptions.procurementManager: Decision maker comparing suppliers and negotiating terms
descriptions.salesRepresentative: Partner or distributor looking to represent TEXOR products

quickActions.subtitle: Get what you need, when you need it

scheduleConsultation.title: Schedule Consultation
scheduleConsultation.description: Free technical consultation with our experts

caseStudies.title: Success Stories
caseStudies.subtitle: Real Results from Real Customers
caseStudies.description: See how leading textile manufacturers across the Middle East and beyond have transformed their operations with TEXOR solutions.

challenges.isfahanTextile: Needed to upgrade 50 old bobbin winding machines with frequent thread breakage issues
challenges.turkishCarpet: Required specialized lacquering equipment for premium carpet yarn production
challenges.gulfTextile: Expanding production capacity for high-performance technical yarns

solutions.isfahanTextile: Installed 50 units of TEXOR Traversing Bobbin Winders with advanced control systems
solutions.turkishCarpet: Deployed 25 units of TEXOR Traversing Lacquer Machines with precision thickness control
solutions.gulfTextile: Complete production line setup with 75 TEXOR machines and automation systems

testimonials.isfahanTextile: TEXOR's solutions transformed our production line. The reduction in thread breakage and increased efficiency exceeded our expectations.
testimonials.turkishCarpet: The precision and consistency of TEXOR lacquer machines helped us achieve premium quality standards for export markets.
testimonials.gulfTextile: TEXOR's comprehensive solution enabled us to enter new markets and achieve international quality standards.
